description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Beef, Mushroom & Asparagus Salad With Miso Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chargrilled Beef, Mushroom & Asparagus Salad With Miso Dressing
name: Chargrilled Beef, Mushroom & Asparagus Salad With Miso Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: On a large serving platter, combine lettuce, edamame, asparagus and beef. Top with mushrooms and drizzle over dressing to serve.
